articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Hearts striker Lawrence Shankland has been linked with a move to Celtic by journalist Mark Guidi.

Shankland has netted 38 goals in 65 games for the Jambos and was previously backed by former Celtic striker John Hartson to make a move to the Bhoys.
articles.title: Celtic tipped by journalist to take a serious look at in-form striker this January

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description: Luis Palma has expressed his delight at Celtic fans for creating a song dedicated to him, expressing gratitude for the warm reception and support he...
articles.title: Celtic star emotional after new fan song

articles.author: Michael Shearer
articles.description:
Celtic centre-back Gustaf Lagerbielke has been named Sweden's defender of the season for his performances for Elfsborg.

Lagerbielke joined Celtic in August from Elfsborg for a reported £3 million on a five-year deal.
articles.title: Celtic defender named Sweden defender of the season

articles.author: celtic
articles.description:
John Hartson will be back on stage at Peadar Browns, Dublin on Friday night. Just over a year since his last visit to the venue. So much has happend over the last year at Celtic Park. Ange leaving, Brendan returning and a treble of trophies to admire in the trophy room at Celtic Park from […]
The post Lots to talk about in Dublin … John Hartson appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Lots to talk about in Dublin … John Hartson
